column5: Influences of Frank Lloyd Wright are everywhere in this hand-crafted tiny house built by ESCAPE TRAVELER with clean lines, elegant maple walls, and 240 degree of windows which invite the outdoors in. It sits atop a very private hilltop, tucked beneath the trees and is the ultimate get-away for honeymooners, anniversary couples as well as solo journeyers who want to relax/refresh or stay tucked in a beautiful space. You can even watch the sun go down from the comfort of you bed if you so desire.
